name: Blowin' Around The World! (Ludum Dare 36)
description:
*** DOWNLOAD PLATFORM BUILDS FOR BETTER EXPERIENCE***

INSTRUCTIONS:

Survive as long as you can.

CONTROLS:

W,A,S,D - Move,

Left Shit - Dash (in direction of move),

Spacebar - Shoot,

Left Mouse Button - Shoot,

R - Restart Level,

Backspace - Toggle Locked Mouse (locks on level load),

Esc - Exit Level/Game,
